irSystemMib.name: irSystemMib
irSystemMib.contactinfo: Postal: MRV Communications, Inc. 295 Foster Street Littleton, MA 01460 E-mail: support@mrv.com
irSystemMib.description: This is the MRV LX System MIB module.

irSysImageFilename.name: irSysImageFilename
irSysImageFilename.description: The name of the image file running on the system.

irSysImageSource.name: irSysImageSource
irSysImageSource.description: This indicates from where the image file was loaded. A value of flash(1) means the file was loaded from flash. A value of network(2) means the file was loaded from the server identified by irSysImageServer object.

irSysImageServer.name: irSysImageServer
irSysImageServer.description: The IP address of the server to be used when retrieving the image file via the network.

irSysSwVersion.name: irSysSwVersion
irSysSwVersion.description: A string indicating the software version running on the system.

irSysSwBootVersion.name: irSysSwBootVersion
irSysSwBootVersion.description: A string indicating the boot software version running on the system.

irSysIpAddress.name: irSysIpAddress
irSysIpAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the ethernet interface.

irSysSubnetMask.name: irSysSubnetMask
irSysSubnetMask.description: The IP subnet mask assigned to the ethernet interface.

irSysBcastAddress.name: irSysBcastAddress
irSysBcastAddress.description: The IP broadcast address assigned to the ethernet interface.

irSysGateway.name: irSysGateway
irSysGateway.description: The default gateway IP address configured for the system.

irSysAction.name: irSysAction
irSysAction.description: A read of this object always returns the value other(1). Setting this object to saveConfig(2) saves the current config to flash. Setting this object to reset(3) resets the device.

irSysSnmpSetErrorString.name: irSysSnmpSetErrorString
irSysSnmpSetErrorString.description: A text string that provides additional info when an snmp set request fails.

irSysPowerType.name: irSysPowerType
irSysPowerType.description: The type of power used by the device.

irSysCurrentTemp.name: irSysCurrentTemp
irSysCurrentTemp.description: The current temp reading (in celsius) for the onboard temperature sensor.

irSysTempThresholdLow.name: irSysTempThresholdLow
irSysTempThresholdLow.description: The low threshold temp setting (in celsius) for the device.

irSysTempThresholdHigh.name: irSysTempThresholdHigh
irSysTempThresholdHigh.description: The high threshold temp setting (in celsius) for the device.

irSysTempHysteresis.name: irSysTempHysteresis
irSysTempHysteresis.description: The hysteresis setting applied to the temp thresholds for the device.

irSysPowerLostTimestamp.name: irSysPowerLostTimestamp
irSysPowerLostTimestamp.description: A string containing the timestamp when the device last lost power.

irSysFlashMemSize.name: irSysFlashMemSize
irSysFlashMemSize.description: The size of flash memory, in megabytes, on the system.

irSysPowerCurrentLoad.name: irSysPowerCurrentLoad
irSysPowerCurrentLoad.description: An Ascii string indicating the total current load, in Amps, used by all power strips attached to this device.

irPowerSupplyTable.name: irPowerSupplyTable
irPowerSupplyTable.description: A list of power supply entries.

irPowerIndex.name: irPowerIndex
irPowerIndex.description: The index of the power unit.

irPowerUnitPresent.name: irPowerUnitPresent
irPowerUnitPresent.description: This indicates if the power unit is present or not.

irPowerInputStatus.name: irPowerInputStatus
irPowerInputStatus.description: This indicates if the power unit is plugged into a power source.

irPowerOutputStatus.name: irPowerOutputStatus
irPowerOutputStatus.description: This indicates the status of the internal power feed to the device components.

irPowerStatus.name: irPowerStatus
irPowerStatus.description: The overall status of the power unit.

irClusterCfgStatus.name: irClusterCfgStatus
irClusterCfgStatus.description: This indicates whether cluster config feature is enabled or disabled.

irClusterName.name: irClusterName
irClusterName.description: The name assigned to the cluster.

irClusterAction.name: irClusterAction
irClusterAction.description: A read of this object always returns the value other(1). Setting this obejct to flushAll(2) will delete all entries configured in the irClusterTable.

irClusterTable.name: irClusterTable
irClusterTable.description: A list of cluster config entries.

irClusterIpAddr.name: irClusterIpAddr
irClusterIpAddr.description: The IP address of the cluster entry.

irClusterStatus.name: irClusterStatus
irClusterStatus.description: The row status value for the entry.

irEnetPortConfigTable.name: irEnetPortConfigTable
irEnetPortConfigTable.description: A list of ethernet port config entries.

irEnetPortIndex.name: irEnetPortIndex
irEnetPortIndex.description: The port index for this enthernet port entry.

irEnetPortBondingStatus.name: irEnetPortBondingStatus
irEnetPortBondingStatus.description: The ethernet port bonding status. For systems with only a single ethernet port, the value will always be none(1).

irEnetPortStatsTable.name: irEnetPortStatsTable
irEnetPortStatsTable.description: A list of ethernet port stats entries.

irEnetPortRecvBytes.name: irEnetPortRecvBytes
irEnetPortRecvBytes.description: The number of bytes received on this port.

irEnetPortRecvPackets.name: irEnetPortRecvPackets
irEnetPortRecvPackets.description: The number of packets received on this port.

irEnetPortRecvErrors.name: irEnetPortRecvErrors
irEnetPortRecvErrors.description: The number of packets received with error.

irEnetPortRecvDropped.name: irEnetPortRecvDropped
irEnetPortRecvDropped.description: The number of received packets dropped.

irEnetPortRecvOverruns.name: irEnetPortRecvOverruns
irEnetPortRecvOverruns.description: The number of received packets that ran out of buffers.

irEnetPortRecvFrameErrors.name: irEnetPortRecvFrameErrors
irEnetPortRecvFrameErrors.description: The number of packets received with frame errors.

irEnetPortRecvMulticast.name: irEnetPortRecvMulticast
irEnetPortRecvMulticast.description: The number of received multicast packets.

irEnetPortRecvCompressed.name: irEnetPortRecvCompressed
irEnetPortRecvCompressed.description: The number of received compressed packets.

irEnetPortXmitBytes.name: irEnetPortXmitBytes
irEnetPortXmitBytes.description: The number of bytes transmitted on this port.

irEnetPortXmitPackets.name: irEnetPortXmitPackets
irEnetPortXmitPackets.description: The number of packets transmitted on this port.

irEnetPortXmitErrors.name: irEnetPortXmitErrors
irEnetPortXmitErrors.description: The number of packets that encountered an error on transmission.

irEnetPortXmitDropped.name: irEnetPortXmitDropped
irEnetPortXmitDropped.description: The number of packets that were dropped due to transmit errors.

irEnetPortXmitOverruns.name: irEnetPortXmitOverruns
irEnetPortXmitOverruns.description: The number of packets that ran out of buffers.

irEnetPortXmitCollisions.name: irEnetPortXmitCollisions
irEnetPortXmitCollisions.description: The number of packets that encountered collisions on transmission.

irEnetPortXmitCompressed.name: irEnetPortXmitCompressed
irEnetPortXmitCompressed.description: The number of transmitted compressed packets.

irEnetPortXmitCarrier.name: irEnetPortXmitCarrier
irEnetPortXmitCarrier.description: The number of transmitted carrier errors.

irIfTable.name: irIfTable
irIfTable.description: A list of IP interface entries.

irIfIndex.name: irIfIndex
irIfIndex.description: The index for this interface entry.

irIfIpAddress.name: irIfIpAddress
irIfIpAddress.description: The IP address assigned to this interface.

irIfIpSubnetMask.name: irIfIpSubnetMask
irIfIpSubnetMask.description: The subnet mask assigned to this interface.

irIfIpBcastAddress.name: irIfIpBcastAddress
irIfIpBcastAddress.description: The broadcast address assigned to this interface.

irIfMtu.name: irIfMtu
irIfMtu.description: The MTU size assigned to this interface.

irIfName.name: irIfName
irIfName.description: The name string assigned to this interface.

irIfBoundTo.name: irIfBoundTo
irIfBoundTo.description: The name of the physical interface to which this interface is bound.

irIfTelnetPort.name: irIfTelnetPort
irIfTelnetPort.description: The telnet port to use when connecting via this interface.

irIfSshPort.name: irIfSshPort
irIfSshPort.description: The ssh port to use when connecting via this interface.

tarNextFreeTrigIndex.name: tarNextFreeTrigIndex
tarNextFreeTrigIndex.description: The next free index in the trigger table.

tarNextFreeActionIndex.name: tarNextFreeActionIndex
tarNextFreeActionIndex.description: The next free index in the trigger action table.

tarNextFreeRuleIndex.name: tarNextFreeRuleIndex
tarNextFreeRuleIndex.description: The next free index in the trigger rule table.

tarTrigIndex.name: tarTrigIndex
tarTrigIndex.description: The index for this trigger entry.

tarTrigName.name: tarTrigName
tarTrigName.description: The name assigned to this trigger.

tarTrigRowStatus.name: tarTrigRowStatus
tarTrigRowStatus.description: The row status for this trigger.

tarActionTable.name: tarActionTable
tarActionTable.description: A list of trigger action entries.

tarActionIndex.name: tarActionIndex
tarActionIndex.description: The index for this action entry.

tarActionName.name: tarActionName
tarActionName.description: The name string assigned to this action.

tarActionCommand.name: tarActionCommand
tarActionCommand.description: The command string assigned to this action.

tarActionRowStatus.name: tarActionRowStatus
tarActionRowStatus.description: The status for this action entry.

tarRuleTable.name: tarRuleTable
tarRuleTable.description: A list of trigger rule entries.

tarRuleIndex.name: tarRuleIndex
tarRuleIndex.description: The index for this rule entry.

tarRuleName.name: tarRuleName
tarRuleName.description: The name string assigned to this rule.

tarRuleTrigId.name: tarRuleTrigId
tarRuleTrigId.description: The trigger index entry to which this rule is attached.

tarRuleActionId.name: tarRuleActionId
tarRuleActionId.description: The trigger action entry to which this rule is attached.

tarRuleExecCount.name: tarRuleExecCount
tarRuleExecCount.description: The number of times the action command for this rule has been executed since the system was started.

tarRuleErrorCount.name: tarRuleErrorCount
tarRuleErrorCount.description: The number of times the execution of this rule has resulted in an error.

tarRuleRowStatus.name: tarRuleRowStatus
tarRuleRowStatus.description: The row status for this entry.

tarTempTrigTable.name: tarTempTrigTable
tarTempTrigTable.description: A list of temp trigger entries.

tarTempTrigPort.name: tarTempTrigPort
tarTempTrigPort.description: The port to which this trigger is attached.

tarTempTrigOperator.name: tarTempTrigOperator
tarTempTrigOperator.description: The logical operator for this trigger.

tarTempTrigThresholdValue.name: tarTempTrigThresholdValue
tarTempTrigThresholdValue.description: The threshold value for this trigger.

tarTempTrigUnits.name: tarTempTrigUnits
tarTempTrigUnits.description: The units for the threshold value.

tarTempTrigHysteresis.name: tarTempTrigHysteresis
tarTempTrigHysteresis.description: The hysteresis value for this trigger.

tarSigTrigTable.name: tarSigTrigTable
tarSigTrigTable.description: A list of signal trigger entries.

tarSigTrigPort.name: tarSigTrigPort
tarSigTrigPort.description: The port to which this trigger is attached.

tarSigTrigSignal.name: tarSigTrigSignal
tarSigTrigSignal.description: The input signal type being monitored.

tarSigTrigState.name: tarSigTrigState
tarSigTrigState.description: The signal state that will cause the action to be taken.

ipmiDiscreteOffset.name: ipmiDiscreteOffset
ipmiDiscreteOffset.description: The offset within the discrete sensor for which the event occurred.

ipmiDiscreteSensorName.name: ipmiDiscreteSensorName
ipmiDiscreteSensorName.description: An Ascii string indicating the name of the IPMI discrete sensor for which the event occurred.

ipmiThresholdType.name: ipmiThresholdType
ipmiThresholdType.description: The type of threshold sensor event.

ipmiThresholdSensorName.name: ipmiThresholdSensorName
ipmiThresholdSensorName.description: An Ascii string indicating the name of the IPMI threshold sensor for which the event occurred.

ipmiThresholdDirection.name: ipmiThresholdDirection
ipmiThresholdDirection.description: The direction of the threshold sensor event.

ipmiThresholdAssert.name: ipmiThresholdAssert
ipmiThresholdAssert.description: The assertion value of the threshold sensor event.
